original_text: You are like a family of dangerous snakes! You will not be able to run away. God will surely punish you, and he will send you to hell.
korean_text: 뱀들아 독사의 새끼들아 너희가 어떻게 지옥의 판결을 피하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: You are like a family of dangerous snakes!
You will not be able to run away.
and he will send you to hell.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 너희를 지옥에 보낼 것이다.
